nodes.bodyText: Please don't use .forEach(...), it can have quite a negative impact on performance. It is advised to use the standard for loop format instead.
Normally it should be done only once when shutting down the server without any players already but I see the point. Agreed, should be resolved now.
Please do not use the star import.

Yeah. I'm trying to find a solution for that :P
My IntelliJ IDEA does that automatically. I guess I'll have to set them manually, as well as add new imports for entries.
Edit: I found the option for that.
